TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FileVersionInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides version information for a physical file on disk.

span.span: Provides version information for a physical file on disk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，版本號碼會顯示為 「 主要版本號碼次要部分數字 」。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". 檔案版本號碼是 64 位元數字保存檔案的版本號碼，如下所示：A file version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows: - 第一個 16 位元會數目。The first 16 bits are the number. - 接下來的 16 位元是數目。The next 16 bits are the number. - 第三個的 16 位元集數目。The third set of 16 bits are the number. - 最後一個 16 位元會數目。The last 16 bits are the number. 使用方法來取得這個類別的包含資訊的檔案，然後查看檔案的相關資訊的屬性。Use the method of this class to get a containing information about a file, then look at the properties for information about the file. 屬性會提供檔案的版本資訊。The property provides version information about the file. ， ， ， ，和屬性會提供指定的檔案是一部分的產品版本資訊。The , , , , and properties provide version information for the product that the specified file is a part of. 呼叫取得這個檔案中的屬性和其值的部分清單。Call to get a partial list of properties and their values for this file. 屬性根據內建的檔案版本資源資訊。The properties are based on version resource information built into the file. 版本資源通常內建二進位檔案，例如.exe 或.dll 檔案;文字檔案並沒有版本資源資訊。Version resources are often built into binary files such as .exe or .dll files; text files do not have version resource information. 在 Win32 資源檔，或組件屬性中，通常會指定版本資源。Version resources are typically specified in a Win32 resource file, or in assembly attributes. 比方說屬性會反映`VS_FF_DEBUG`檔案中的值加上旗標`VS_FIXEDFILEINFO`區塊中，從內建`VERSIONINFO`Win32 資源檔中的資源。For example the property reflects the `VS_FF_DEBUG` flag value in the file's `VS_FIXEDFILEINFO` block, which is built from the `VERSIONINFO` resource in a Win32 resource file. 如需在 Win32 資源檔中指定版本資源的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 關於資源檔 」 和平台 SDK 中的 「 VERSIONINFO 資源 」。For more information about specifying version resources in a Win32 resource file, see "About Resource Files" and "VERSIONINFO Resource" in the Platform SDK. 如需在.NET 模組中指定版本資源的詳細資訊，請參閱[設定組件屬性](~/docs/framework/app-domains/set-assembly-attributes.md)主題。For more information about specifying version resources in a .NET module, see the [Setting Assembly Attributes](~/docs/framework/app-domains/set-assembly-attributes.md) topic. > [!NOTE] > 此類別會在類別層級套用至所有成員的連結要求。This class makes a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. A立即呼叫端沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full trust permission. 如需連結要求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。For details about link demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md). ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫以取得如 [記事本]。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然後它會列印在文字方塊中的檔案描述和版本號碼。Then it prints the file description and version number in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已具現化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個類別不能由部分信任的程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.

public: property System::String ^ Comments { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the comments associated with the file.

span.span: Gets the comments associated with the file.

value.span: 與檔案關聯的註解，如果檔案未包含版本資訊，則為 。

span.span: The comments associated with the file or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性包含可供診斷之用顯示其他資訊。This property contains additional information that can be displayed for diagnostic purposes. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫以取得如 [記事本]。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然後它會顯示在文字方塊中的註解。Then it prints the comments in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已具現化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. span.span: Gets the name of the company that produced the file.

value.span: 產生檔案的公司名稱，如果檔案未包含版本資訊，則為 。

span.span: The name of the company that produced the file or if the file did not contain version information.

summary.span: Gets the build number of the file.

span.span: Gets the build number of the file.

value.span: 代表檔案組建編號的值，如果檔案未包含版本資訊，則為 。

span.span: A value representing the build number of the file or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，版本號碼會顯示為 「 主要版本號碼次要部分數字 」。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". 檔案版本號碼是 64 位元數字保存檔案的版本號碼，如下所示：A file version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows: - 第一個 16 位元會數目。The first 16 bits are the number. - 接下來的 16 位元是數目。The next 16 bits are the number. - 第三個的 16 位元集數目。The third set of 16 bits are the number. - 最後一個 16 位元會數目。The last 16 bits are the number. 這個屬性會取得第三個 16 位元的集合。This property gets the third set of 16 bits. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫以取得如 [記事本]。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然後它會列印在文字方塊中。Then it prints the in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已具現化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. summary.span: Gets the major part of the version number.

span.span: Gets the major part of the version number.

value.span: 代表版本號碼主要部分的值，如果檔案未包含版本資訊，則為 0 (零)。

span.span: A value representing the major part of the version number or 0 (zero) if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，版本號碼會顯示為 「 主要版本號碼次要部分數字 」。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". 檔案版本號碼是 64 位元數字保存檔案的版本號碼，如下所示：A file version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows: - 第一個 16 位元會數目。The first 16 bits are the number. - 接下來的 16 位元是數目。The next 16 bits are the number. - 第三個的 16 位元集數目。The third set of 16 bits are the number. - 最後一個 16 位元會數目。The last 16 bits are the number. 這個屬性會取得第一個集合的 16 位元。This property gets the first set of 16 bits. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫以取得如 [記事本]。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然後它會列印在文字方塊中。Then it prints the in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已具現化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. value.span: 如果檔案包含偵錯資訊或以偵錯功能的方式編譯，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the file contains debugging information or is compiled with debugging features enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性根據內建的檔案版本資源資訊。The properties are based on version resource information built into the file. 版本資源通常內建二進位檔案，例如.exe 或.dll 檔案;文字檔案並沒有版本資源資訊。Version resources are often built into binary files such as .exe or .dll files; text files do not have version resource information. 在 Win32 資源檔，或組件屬性中，通常會指定版本資源。Version resources are typically specified in a Win32 resource file, or in assembly attributes. 屬性會反映`VS_FF_DEBUG`檔案中的值加上旗標`VS_FIXEDFILEINFO`區塊中，從內建`VERSIONINFO`Win32 資源檔中的資源。The property reflects the `VS_FF_DEBUG` flag value in the file's `VS_FIXEDFILEINFO` block, which is built from the `VERSIONINFO` resource in a Win32 resource file. 如需在 Win32 資源檔中指定版本資源的詳細資訊，請參閱 Platform SDK`About Resource Files`主題和`VERSIONINFO Resource`主題的主題。For more information about specifying version resources in a Win32 resource file, see the Platform SDK `About Resource Files` topic and `VERSIONINFO Resource` topic topics. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫以取得如 [記事本]。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然後它會顯示布林值的狀態在文字方塊中。Then it displays the state of the Boolean in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已具現化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsPrivateBuild As Boolean
public: property bool IsPrivateBuild { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the file was built using standard release procedures.

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the file was built using standard release procedures.

value.span: 如果檔案是私用組建，則為 ；如果檔案是使用標準發行程序所建置，或是檔案未包含版本資訊，則為 。

span.span: if the file is a private build; if the file was built using standard release procedures or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個值是`true`，將說明這個版本的檔案與標準的版本不同的方式。If this value is `true`, will describe how this version of the file differs from the standard version. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫以取得如 [記事本]。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然後在文字方塊中顯示的私用組建資訊。Then it displays the private build information in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已具現化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSpecialBuild As Boolean
public: property bool IsSpecialBuild { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the file is a special build.

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the file is a special build.

value.span: 如果檔案是特殊的組建則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the file is a special build; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是特殊的組建檔案使用標準發行程序，建置，但不同於相同的版本號碼的標準檔案的檔案。A file that is a special build was built using standard release procedures, but the file differs from a standard file of the same version number. 如果這個值是`true`，則屬性必須指定這個檔案與標準的版本不同的方式。If this value is `true`, the property must specify how this file differs from the standard version. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫以取得如 [記事本]。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然後它會顯示此版本是否為特殊組建版本，在文字方塊中。Then it displays whether this version is a special build version in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已具現化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProductBuildPart As Integer
public: property int ProductBuildPart { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets the build number of the product this file is associated with.

span.span: Gets the build number of the product this file is associated with.

value.span: 代表與這個檔案關聯之產品組建編號的值，如果檔案未包含版本資訊，則為 。

span.span: A value representing the build number of the product this file is associated with or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，版本號碼會顯示為 「 主要版本號碼次要部分數字 」。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". 產品版本號碼是 64 位元數字保存的版本號碼，如下所示：A product version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number as follows: - 第一個 16 位元會數目。The first 16 bits are the number. - 接下來的 16 位元是數目。The next 16 bits are the number. - 第三個的 16 位元集數目。The third set of 16 bits are the number. - 最後一個 16 位元會數目。The last 16 bits are the number. 這個屬性會取得第三個 16 位元的集合。This property gets the third set of 16 bits. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫以取得如 [記事本]。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然後它會列印在文字方塊中。Then it prints the in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已具現化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets the version of the product this file is distributed with.

value.span: 連同這個檔案一起散發的產品版本，如果檔案未包含版本資訊，則為 。

span.span: The version of the product this file is distributed with or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，版本號碼會顯示為 「 主要版本號碼次要部分數字 」。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". 產品版本號碼是 64 位元數字保存的版本號碼，如下所示：A product version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number as follows: - 第一個 16 位元會數目。The first 16 bits are the number. - 接下來的 16 位元是數目。The next 16 bits are the number. - 第三個的 16 位元集數目。The third set of 16 bits are the number. - 最後一個 16 位元會數目。The last 16 bits are the number. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫以取得如 [記事本]。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然後它會列印在文字方塊中。Then it prints the in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已具現化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets the special build information for the file.

span.span: Gets the special build information for the file.

value.span: 檔案的特殊組建資訊，如果檔案未包含版本資訊，則為 。

span.span: The special build information for the file or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`true`，必須指定這個檔案與檔案的標準版本不同的方式。If is `true`, must specify how this file differs from the standard version of the file. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫以取得如 [記事本]。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然後它會列印在文字方塊中的特殊組建資訊。Then it prints the special build information in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已具現化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
